title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3, etc. locally via a single CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node & browsers).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, or tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface, model manager, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli (mattb/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive REPL wrapper around Ollama with readline, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot (samdenty/ollama-copilot)
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copplet code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama4j (amithkou/ollama4j)
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb (rmariano/ollama-rb)
summary: Ruby gem for chatting and generating with Ollama models.

title: ollama.nvim (nomnivore/ollama.nvim)
summary: Neovim plugin to query Ollama models inside buffers with optional selection prompting.

title: ollama-ex (kevinlang/ollama-ex)
summary: Elixir library and Mix tasks for running and chatting with Ollama.

title: ollama-rs (pepperoni21/ollama-rs)
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dart (frencesco/ollama-dart)
summary: Dart/Flutter package for integrating Ollama into mobile/desktop apps.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker (ollama/ollama-docker)
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-models (jmorganca/ollama-models)
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Llama-3, Phi-3, Starling, Zephyr, etc.

title: ollama-discord-bot (ciroque/ollama-discord-bot)
summary: Discord bot that brings Ollama models into servers with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack-bot (raphaelmansuy/ollama-slack-bot)
summary: Python Slack Bolt app to chat with Ollama inside Slack channels/DMs.

title: ollama-obsidian (sytone/ollama-obsidian)
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run private LLMs via Ollama for note Q&A and summarization.
